page.title: 16F of D News 2
page.content: {A new book-Severn and Wye Railway(vol 2)published November 1985.Picture reproduced of{Coleford Junction Signal {Box}with "Will Scarlet,"a{locomotive- this was in the time when the{railway formed backbone of{Forest}industry. 6th December.A{Forester}was married in the{Tower of London.Regional Aid}to the{Forest}has been{Â£731,000-}does not seem to have created new jobs.A{rugby player from{Yorkley}died of a heart attack while playing the game at{Berry {Hill.For sale}this week are{Christmas {trees,vegetables,a fridge,woodburning {stoves,bikes,cars,labrador puppies. Services advertised include{computer {repair,carpentry,electrical installat- {ion,tree surgery and landscaping.Situ- {ations vacant include workshop assist- {ant,biology teacher,insurance repre- {sentative and food hamper agent. {Reporter of Guardian has retired.
